question:
Consider the following unconventional resources:
  1. Shale Gas
  2. Tight Oil
  3. Coal Bed Methane
Currently, which of the above is/are under commercial production in India?
explanation: Coal Bed Methane (CBM) is natural gas found in coal seams. Great Eastern Energy Corp. Ltd (GEECL), Essar Oil Ltd and Reliance Industries Ltd (RIL) are the three existing players selling CBM gas in the market. Reliance Industries Ltd (RIL) has recently begun commercial production of coal bed methane (CBM) gas from two blocks in Madhya Pradesh. The two blocks are located in Sohagpur East and West. There is still no commercial production of Tight Oil and Shale gas in India.
